description:
Whether you don’t feel like carrying a bag and load up the pockets, or keep them empty for a streamlined look, these comfy cargos give you options. On the trail, in the bike lane, or just window shopping, the Vander cargo pants feel great and have a fun utilitarian style.

  • Cotton with added nylon for durability and spandex for a comfortable stretch
  • Elasticised waist and integrated belt let you snug in your perfect fit. The belt is removeable if you want to use your own
  • Paneled lower leg construction for enhanced mobility
  • Plenty of pocket space for the day’s must haves
  • Elasticised cuffs keep chilly air out and tuck nicely into the top of boots
  • Uses Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) cotton. The BCI is a not-for-profit association committed to a holistic approach to sustainable cotton production
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
  • Regular fit wears like and old favourite
name: Kathmandu Vander Cargo Pants - Women's
